MemoryInfobox.name: Curses and Cures
MemoryInfobox.description: 'A physician devoted to caring for both spirit and body requested help removing a curse by removing the person who placed the curse.'

General_Description: '''Curses and Cures''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A [[Doctor|physician]] sought a [[mercenary]]'s help to remove a curse.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra noticed a job posted on a [[message board]]. *'''Note:'''
''I'm a physician in need of some help with a difficult curse. If you think you can aid me, let's talk.'' She sought out the physician and addressed him. *'''Kassandra:''' ''I got your message on the board. What's going on?'' *'''Man:''' ''One of my patients has lost all favor with the gods. I need help lifting the curse that's been placed on her.'' |-|I'm good with curses.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Well, I might have some sway with the gods.'' |-|Gods aren't my specialty.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm not sure I have much say in the gods' business.'' *'''Man:''' ''The problem isn't the gods. It's with the person who laid the curse.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''So you want me to deal with her.'' *'''Man:''' ''The gods show me mercy. That is exactly what I desire.'' (Accept – I'm going to help you.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''All right. I'm in.'' *'''Man:''' ''Thank you. You saved me.'' *'''Kassandra:''' Chaire. Kassandra left the physician and sought out the priestess. *'''Kassandra:''' ''You've made a few enemies, stranger. Including the person who hired me.'' *'''Woman:''' ''No, please. There must be something I can do to change your mind.'' |-|Fine, join my crew.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''I might be able to help you escape... If you're willing to join [[Adrestia|my crew?]]'' *'''Woman:''' ''I must abandon my life here completely to avoid death? Fine, if that's what it takes.'' |-|Not interested.= *[dialogue] Kassandra killed the woman. After dealing with the priestess, she returned to the physician. *'''Man:''' ''Has she been... taken care of,'' misthios? *'''Kassandra:''' ''She's no longer a concern.'' *'''Man:''' ''Then this belongs to you. Nice work, ''misthios. *'''Kassandra:''' ''That'll do.''
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''

Structured_Dialogue.content: Kassandra noticed a job posted on a [[message board]].

*'''Note:'''
''I'm a physician in need of some help with a difficult curse. If you think you can aid me, let's talk.''
She sought out the physician and addressed him.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I got your message on the board. What's going on?''
*'''Man:''' ''One of my patients has lost all favor with the gods. I need help lifting the curse that's been placed on her.''
<tabber>
|-|I'm good with curses.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Well, I might have some sway with the gods.''
|-|Gods aren't my specialty.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm not sure I have much say in the gods' business.''
</tabber>
*'''Man:''' ''The problem isn't the gods. It's with the person who laid the curse.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So you want me to deal with her.''
*'''Man:''' ''The gods show me mercy. That is exactly what I desire.''
(Accept – I'm going to help you.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''All right. I'm in.''
*'''Man:''' ''Thank you. You saved me.''
*'''Kassandra:''' Chaire.
Kassandra left the physician and sought out the priestess.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You've made a few enemies, stranger. Including the person who hired me.''
*'''Woman:''' ''No, please. There must be something I can do to change your mind.''
<tabber>
|-|Fine, join my crew.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I might be able to help you escape... If you're willing to join [[Adrestia|my crew?]]''
*'''Woman:''' ''I must abandon my life here completely to avoid death? Fine, if that's what it takes.''
|-|Not interested.=
*[dialogue]
Kassandra killed the woman.
</tabber>
After dealing with the priestess, she returned to the physician.
*'''Man:''' ''Has she been... taken care of,'' misthios?
*'''Kassandra:''' ''She's no longer a concern.''
*'''Man:''' ''Then this belongs to you. Nice work, ''misthios.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That'll do.''
